# Edward Maniura

| birth_place         = Lubsza, Poland
| death_date          =
| death_place         =
}}
Edward Makary Maniura (born 24 February 1960 in Lubsza) is a Polish politician. He was elected to the Sejm on 25 September 2005, getting 11,279 votes in 28 CzÄ™stochowa district as a candidate from the Civic Platform list.
He was also a member of Sejm 1997-2001 and Sejm 2001-2005.
See also
*Members of Polish Sejm 2005-2007
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060716175616/http://www.sejm.gov.pl/poslowie/posel5/215.htm Edward Maniura - parliamentary page] - includes declarations of interest, voting record, and transcripts of speeches.
